稱作.definition: to be called; to be known as

稱做.definition: to be called; to be known as

稱呼.definition: to call; to address as; form of address; appellation

稱多.definition: Chindu County (Tibetan: khri 'du rdzong) in Yushu Tibetan Autonomous Prefecture 玉樹藏族自治州|玉树藏族自治州[Yu4 shu4 Zang4 zu2 Zi4 zhi4 zhou1], Qinghai

稱多縣.definition: Chindu County (Tibetan: khri 'du rdzong) in Yushu Tibetan Autonomous Prefecture 玉樹藏族自治州|玉树藏族自治州[Yu4 shu4 Zang4 zu2 Zi4 zhi4 zhou1], Qinghai

稱帝.definition: to declare oneself emperor; to win the best actor award

稱心如意.definition: (idiom) after one's own heart; gratifying; satisfactory; everything one could wish

稱為.definition: to be called; to be known as; to call it "..."

稱職.definition: well qualified; competent; to be equal to the task; able to do sth very well

稱說.definition: to declare; to state; to call; to name

稱譽.definition: to acclaim; to sing the praises of

稱讚.definition: to praise; to acclaim; to commend; to compliment

稱霸.definition: lit. to proclaim oneself hegemon; to take a leading role; to build a personal fiefdom

稱願.definition: to feel gratified (esp. at the misfortune of a loathed person); to have one's wish fulfilled
